resources.string: Do you often have headeaches?
Is your appetite poor?
Do you sleep badly?
Do your hands shake?
Are you easili frightened?
Do you feel nervous, tense or worried?
Is your digestion poor?
Do you have trouble thinking clearly?
Do you feel unhappy?
Do you cry more than usual?
Do you find it difficult to enjoy your daily activities?
Do you find it difficult to make decisions?
Is your daily work suffering?
Are you unable to play a useful part in life?
Have you lost interest in things?
Do you feel that you are a worthless person?
Has the thought of ending your life been on your mind?
Do you feel tired all the time?
Do you have uncomfortable feelings in your stomach?
Are you easily tired?
Do you consume an excessive amount of alcoholic drink or do you take any drugs?
Do you feel convinced that a particular person is threatening you?
Is there any unusual or disturbing thoughts on your mind?
Do you hear unsourced noise which also can be unrecognizable by anyone else?
Have you experienced a bad dream about particular disasters or is there any specific moment that recall you back to experiencing particular disasters?
Do you avoid any activity, place, person, or thought related with that particular disaster?
Have your interest on doing daily activities / having friends around diminished ?
Do you feel so disturbed if you were in a situation that recall you back to particular disaster or if you had a sudden thought to that particular disaster?
Do you have any issues in expressing or understanding your feeling?
